version_description:
#### QuickTurtle's new game "WorkeMon!" Has been released! ####
Enjoy your rich life in the fantastic "WorkeMon!" world!

[v.1.0.27]
- A total of 13 languages have been added.
- Option > Change language
(English, 日本語, Português Brasil, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Español, Português Portugal, Français, 한국어, Русский, Polski, Español México, Deutsch, Türk)

[v.1.0.18]
- Add Event

[v.1.0.17]
- Additional languages in various countries
(Português Brasil, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Español, Português Portugal)
- Add Language setting function
(Option -> Change language)
- Small bug fixes

[v.1.0.6]
- Add game graphics resources
- Add various sound effects

[v.1.0.4]
- Fixed-related translation.
- Minor bug fix

#### QuickTurtle's new game "WorkeMon!" Has been released! ####
Enjoy your rich life in the fantastic "WorkeMon!" world!

[v.1.0.27]
- A total of 13 languages have been added.
- Option > Change language
(English, 日本語, Português Brasil, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Español, Português Portugal, Français, 한국어, Русский, Polski, Español México, Deutsch, Türk)

- Add Event

(Português Brasil, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Español, Português Portugal)

(Option -> Change language)
- Small bug fixes

[v.1.0.6]
- Add game graphics resources
- Add various sound effects

[v.1.0.4]
- Fixed-related translation.
- Minor bug fix

** Happy New Year! ^_^ **

[v.1.0.29] - 2018.01.16
- QuickTurtle's new game, "BattlePop", is released!
- Fixed a problem with aspect ratio.
- Fixed other minor bugs.
Thank you :)
